casebody.data:
In the Matter of B.M. No. 509P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 16, 2007. E. Marshall Woodall, Lillington, for Harnett County DSS. Peter Wood, for Mother. Richard Croutharmel, for Father. Pamela N. Williams, for Guardian ad Litem.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of October 2007 by Petitioner for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of October 2007."
